reviewText: This is an excellent DVD about Vengerov. It makes me feel inspired and happy whenever I watch it, he is such a wonderful soul with amazing talent in interpreting music.
What a beautiful film. Vengerov is the master violinist of our times, but sadly has been missing from the performing scene for a while due to injury. This film reminds us what we have lost.
Maxim Vengerov DVD Living the Dream.  As an ex violinist this DVD is enchanting and I shall watch it again and again

I got this for my mom for her birthday and she was really pleased!  It gives you a alternate, more in depth view of his life.  Not really a performance DVD but an entertaining look at what how Mr. Vengerov lives inside and outside the concert hall.  A must-buy for classical enthusiasts!  I hope he comes to LA again!

Everyone who plays violin or love violin should buy this DVD. It is very excelent to know how humble this best violinist in the world is. I wish there will be many Mr. Vengerov' DVDs in the future. As watching him played always thrill me and inspired me to practise more and to love music more deeply. Good luck, Mr Vengerov !!!!
